Package Summary
Package
Description
net.cnoga.paint
Pain(t).
net.cnoga.paint.client.popup
Provides reusable popup dialogs for user input and warnings.
net.cnoga.paint.core.brews
Contains all "Brews" for the Paint application.
net.cnoga.paint.core.bus
Provides a lightweight, annotation-driven event bus for decoupled communication between components of the paint application.
net.cnoga.paint.core.bus.events.request
Contains request event types used for communication through the centralized event bus.
net.cnoga.paint.core.bus.events.response
Contains response event types published on the centralized event bus.
net.cnoga.paint.core.fxml_controllers
Root JavaFX controller layer for the application.
net.cnoga.paint.core.fxml_controllers.subwindow
JavaFX controller classes for secondary application windows and dialogs.
net.cnoga.paint.core.fxml_controllers.window
JavaFX controllers for primary application windows and layout regions.
net.cnoga.paint.core.tool
Core drawing tools for the application.
net.cnoga.paint.core.util
General-purpose utility classes and helpers for canvas operations and drawing.
net.cnoga.paint.core.workspace
Manages paint workspaces and related capabilities.
net.cnoga.paint.server
Provides a minimal local HTTP server for exposing workspace snapshots.
